Content is King: Data is the hero, UI is the frame
Contrast: Stark black/white contrast for readability
Negative Space: Use whitespace to group data, not lines

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'IBM Plex Sans' for all headings to give a technical/financial look.
Use 'Manrope' for body text for high legibility.
Implement the 'Control Room' grid for the dashboard: high density, minimal gaps (gap-4).
Use the 'Swiss & High-Contrast' color theme: White background, Black text, minimal color usage (only for data/status).
For the Flow Graph, try to use Recharts Sankey first. If it's too limited, use a simple SVG implementation or D3 wrapper.
Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
Do NOT use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors or subtle noise textures.
Use the provided image URLs for avatars and backgrounds. Do not use placeholders.
Create a 'Layout' component that wraps pages and handles the sidebar/header structure.
Use Shadcn UI components but customize them to match the 'Swiss' aesthetic (sharper corners, higher contrast borders).
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable
